description:
Featured characters of One Piece, Toriko and Dragon Ball enter the IGO tournament in order to gain the Carat meat, which is said to be the most tasteful in the world. However, it leads in a tie between Goku, Toriko and Luffy. Meanwhile, Zoro, Zebra and Vegeta meet accidentally in a remote part of the race, and start fighting.
Source: http://onepiece.fandom.com/

titles.title: Jijou Saikyou Collab tai Umi no Taishokukan
La collaboration la plus forte de l`histoire VS le Glouton des océans !
The Mightiest Team-Up in History vs. the Glutton of the Sea
Сильнейшая команда в истории против Морского Обжоры!
史上最強コラボVS[たい]海の大食漢
